entry.title: Using Zola to Keep It Quick, Easy, and Lightweight!
entry.summary: Many people have reservations about using Static Site Generators and prefer building their websites manually. I used to share this perspective, but I've come to realize that it's not always the best choice. Often, individuals tend to complicate things by using complex technologies like React and intricate backend systems, which can lead to unnecessary complexity. Here's why.

entry.title: Cron Jobs: A gift for the lazy!
entry.summary: Cron jobs allow you to schedule tasks to run automatically at a specified time and date. They are commonly used for running periodic jobs like backups, sending emails, data aggregation, etc.
